thread.title: BRIEF-Chongqing Sokon Industry Signs Strategic Agreement With Baidu On Areas Including Autopilot

title: BRIEF-Chongqing Sokon Industry Signs Strategic Agreement With Baidu On Areas Including Autopilot

organizations.name: brief-chongqing sokon industry signs strategic agree
chongqing sokon industry group co ltd
baidu on areas including autopilot reuters

text:
April 2, 2018 / 1:14 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Chongqing Sokon Industry Signs Strategic Agreement With Baidu On Areas Including Autopilot Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 2 (Reuters) - Chongqing Sokon Industry Group Co Ltd : 
* SAYS IT SIGNS STRATEGIC AGREEMENT WITH BAIDU ON AREAS INCLUDING AUTOPILOT Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2ImZV3Z   (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
